attributes.action: Allow apprentices who’s tests have been delayed to get predicted pass/grade
attributes.additional_details:
Getting these grades will allow us to be qualified ready for after lockdown. 
Allowing us to peruse our desired career.
attributes.background: I want the government/parliament to consider us apprentices that was ready to do our exams/tests but have been delayed due to COVID-19. By allowing us to get predicted grades or predicted passes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567003
